Technical events


Trouble shooting


In software development, debugging involves locating and correcting code errors in a computer program. Debugging is part of the software testing process and is an integral part of the entire software development lifecycle. So here in this competition you will have to clear the bugs.

Discover More

Codenza


This event will be having two rounds. The first one will be the prelims and the other will be the coding round. In prelims there will be forty one mark questions and the coding round will be having set of question papers .Each team will be given any one of the set to develop their solution. Those who perform well in the prelims will be selected by the judge for the second round.

Discover More

Isite Genesis


"Design is the intermediary between information and understanding" Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The term "web design" is normally used to describe the design process relating to the front end(Client side) design of a website including writing markup. If you think math is hard, try web design. Great web design without functionality is like a sports car with no engine. Design is a formal response to a strategic questions. The function of design is letting design function. Make it simple but significant.

Discover More

Cryptica


“Unlocking knowledge at the speed of thought”. Cryptica is a technical quiz can be defined as a game or brain teaser to test knowledge. This technical event contains many rounds, when participants play against each other to get the highest score, which may helps participants become more engaged. It is a pursuit of trivial knowledge, encouraging students to achieve and increase their awareness of the technical world around them. Quizzes are designed to promote, a fun way to study and it helps to improve one’s technical skills. With a wide array of questions from numerous technical topics, this is the one event which will breach the boundaries of your technical knowledge. Are you up to speed on what’s going on in the tech industry today?

Discover More

Innov Presenta


Present your innovative thoughts in this event. Prepare a presentation and unleash the speaker in you. Trying is winning!

Discover More
  • Trouble Shooting


    In software development, debugging involves locating and correcting code errors in a computer program. Debugging is part of the software testing process and is an integral part of the entire software development lifecycle. So here in this competition you will have to clear the bugs.


    ROUNDS:

    ❖ PRELIMS


    ❖ FINALS

    RULES :

    ❖ Participants will not be allowed to use any electrical devices inside the hall while the competition is going on.


    ❖ Participants involved in any malpractice will be disqualified.


    ❖ Individual participation is only allowed.

    PRELIMS :

    This Round consists of MCQ questions from programming languages like C,C++,JAVA with relevant options. It consists of 40 questions. 30 minutes will be allotted for this round.

    FINALS :

    The Students those who are selected in Prelims can attend this round. In this round, students will be given three sets of programs from C,C++ and JAVA.The participants can choose any two programs from the following languages.The program to be debugged will be loaded in the respective systems in their suitable softwares.The participants have to debug and show the expected output. The time taken to debug and execute the output will be noted. Maximum time given for this round is 60 minutes.Judge’s decision will be final.


  • Codenza


    This event will be having two rounds. The first one will be the prelims and the other will be the coding round. In prelims there will be forty one mark questions and the coding round will be having set of question papers .Each team will be given any one of the set to develop their solution. Those who perform well in the prelims will be selected by the judge for the second round.

    Languages

    ❖ C,

    ❖ C++,

    ❖ Java,

    ❖ Python.

    General Rules

    ❖ Two teams can represent from a college.

    ❖ Each team should be comprised of two members.

    ❖ Should maintain silence inside the lab.

    ❖ Languages C,C++,Java and Python.

    ❖ Cheating will not be tolerated at any means.

    ❖ Using mobile phones inside the lab is prohibited.

    ❖ Disturbing other team members will lead to disqualification.

    ❖ Arguing with the judges or the event coordinators will lead to disqualification.

    Round 1

    Rules

    ❖ Prelims will be conducted. ( Questions will come from C,C++,Java and Python)

    ❖ Total time allocated for this round will be 1 Hour.

    Round 2

    Rules

    ❖ The second round will be the coding round for which you have to develop a solution for a given problem ….. which can be in either C,C++,Java or Python. (The solution you provide should be the optimal solution...marks won’t be given to comprised solution).

    ❖ Total time allocated for this round will be 1 Hour 30 minutes.


  • Isite Genesis


    "Design is the intermediary between information and understanding". Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The term "web design" is normally used to describe the design process relating to the front end(Client side) design of a website including writing markup. If you think math is hard, try web design. Great web design without functionality is like a sports car with no engine. Design is a formal response to a strategic questions. The function of design is letting design function. Make it simple but significant.


    ROUNDS

    ❖ PRELIMS

    ❖ MAIN

    PRELIMS:

    This Round consists of full of MCQ questions with relative options. There are four set of questions named A, B, C, D. Each set consist of 30 questions. 30 minutes will be allotted for this round.

    ❖ According to the strength of students and marks, Students will be selected for next round called Mains.

    MAINS:

    Mains is the second round of ISITE GENESIS(Advancing beyond). The Students those who are selected in Prelims can attend this round.

    In this round students should create a web design for the template which will be given by us (CHITS web designing authorities). We provide one hour for every design. Students should use HTML and CSS for creating the web Design. One student can create only one design in the given time. Judge will decide the final winners. Three students will be selected as the winner of the round.

    RULES:

    ❖ Students will not be allowed to use any electrical devices inside the hall while the competition is going.

    ❖ Students should use the languages for creating the designs which we given to you.


  • Cryptica


    “Unlocking knowledge at the speed of thought”. Cryptica is a technical quiz can be defined as a game or brain teaser to test knowledge. This technical event contains many rounds, when participants play against each other to get the highest score, which may helps participants become more engaged. It is a pursuit of trivial knowledge, encouraging students to achieve and increase their awareness of the technical world around them. Quizzes are designed to promote, a fun way to study and it helps to improve one’s technical skills. With a wide array of questions from numerous technical topics, this is the one event which will breach the boundaries of your technical knowledge. Are you up to speed on what’s going on in the tech industry today?


    Rules and Regulation:

    ❖ A team should consist of 2 members.

    ❖ Event contains One Preliminary round and four final rounds totally five rounds.

    ❖ Topic based on Programming language [C, C++, Java (optional), python (optional)], Current trends in IT and Networking.

    ❖ Replacement of any participants of a team in any round is not allowed for after registration.

    ❖ The participants should not be allowed to use mobile or any other electronic instruments.

    ❖ The decision of the quiz master will be final and will not be subjected to any change.


  • Innov Presenta


    Present your innovative thoughts in this event. Prepare a presentation and unleash the speaker in you. Trying is winning!


    Topics:

    ❖ AI innovations for society


    ❖ Robotics


    ❖ Biochips


    ❖ Smart home


    ❖ Cloud computing


    Rules and regulations:

    ❖ Each team can consist of maximum of 2 members.


    ❖ Each member in a team should register individually.


    ❖ Bring the college ID card on the day of event.


    ❖ The participants are expected to be present at the venue before the event commences.


    ❖ Participants can bring their own laptops and do bring one hard copy and one soft copy of the paper presentation and abstract.


    ❖ Each team will have 5 minutes(4 Minutes for presentation and 1 minute for queries).


    ❖ The Presentation should be maximum of 20 slides.


    ❖ Participants will be judged on the basis of Presentation, Content, Clarity, Relevance and Preparation.


    ❖ Organizing Committee's decision in any matter will be final and abiding on all.




Non-Technical events


Memathon


Memathon is an event of creating memes. Participants should create memes within given time. This event contains two rounds, participants those who are shortlisted from first round will attend second round.

Discover More

Classifieds


World lives on advertising.. Ads have the power to reach a wide range of audience they sell products...We won't be able to find varieties of a product in the modern world wothout advertising . Here in Classifieds we want you to sell products by advertising. We want quirk and catchy ways to display the features of your products inorder to sell. We award points based on how u convince us to buy ur product if it were real. That's it. That's the context of our event Classifieds. Do remember classifieds don't take up much space so be sweet and short!

Discover More

Hounds of Treasure


       A hounds of treasure is a game in which the organizers prepare a list defining specific items, which the participants seek to gather or complete all items on the list, usually without purchasing them. Usually participants work in small teams, although the rules may allow individuals to participate. The goal is to be the first to complete the list or to complete the most items on that list. In variations of the game, players take photographs of listed items or be challenged to complete the tasks on the list in the most creative manner. A treasure hunt is another name for the game, but it may involve following a series of clues to find objects or a single prize in a particular order.

Discover More

  • Memathon


    Memathon is an event of creating memes. Participants should create memes within given time. This event contains two rounds, participants those who are shortlisted from first round will attend second round.


    Rules for Memathon

    1.Participants are allowed to participate in competition only if they have lot no(reg no).

    2.Participants should bring mobile phone with internet connection.

    3.Topics will be given on spot.

    4.Do not use offensive words or templates.

    5.Team works are not allowed.

    6.Two rounds will be conducted, shortlisted participants from first round will be selected to second round.

    7.Participants should create memes within the given time.

    8.If any participant is caught by cheating they will be disqualified.


  • Classifieds


    World lives on advertising. Ads have the power to reach a wide range of audience they sell products...We won't be able to find varieties of a product in the modern world wothout advertising. Here in Classifieds we want you to sell products by advertising. We want quirk and catchy ways to display the features of your products inorder to sell. We award points based on how u convince us to buy ur product if it were real. That's it. That's the context of our event Classifieds. Do remember classifieds don't take up much space so be sweet and short !


    Rules and regulations:

    ❖ The participants will be given topics on the spot.

    ❖ The participants should perform only on the exact given topic, There should not be any alterations.

    ❖ Participants shall use sign boards and appropriate props.

    ❖ Participants will be given 3 mins for preparation and 3 mins for performance.

    ❖ Each team shall contain minimum three members and maximum six members.

    ❖ Points will be rewarded based on clarity, presentation and cacheness of the content.

    ❖ Hurting of individuals, a group or a community sentiments in the name of fun, leads to be disqualified.



  • Hounds of Treasure


    A hounds of treasure is a game in which the organizers prepare a list defining specific items, which the participants seek to gather or complete all items on the list, usually without purchasing them. Usually participants work in small teams, although the rules may allow individuals to participate. The goal is to be the first to complete the list or to complete the most items on that list. In variations of the game, players take photographs of listed items or be challenged to complete the tasks on the list in the most creative manner. A treasure hunt is another name for the game, but it may involve following a series of clues to find objects or a single prize in a particular order.

    Rules:

    ❖ Two teams can participate from one college.


    ❖ Each team can be comprised of 4 members.


    ❖ Using mobile phones are prohibited and any malpractice during in it that will be lead your team disqualified.


    ❖ The Top scorers in prelims will be select for next level.


    ❖ Map will be provided for participants in the second round for finding clues.


    ❖ Participants should maintain discipline inside the college campus.


    ❖ Cheating will not be tolerated at any means.


    ❖ Those who are arguing with event head or members or other team members will lead to be disqualified.

    ❖ Each member in a team should register individually.


    ❖ Bring the college ID card on the day of event.


    ❖ The participants are expected to be present at the venue before the event commences.


    ❖ Participants can bring their own laptops and do bring one hard copy and one soft copy of the paper presentation and abstract.


    ❖ Each team will have 5 minutes(4 Minutes for presentation and 1 minute for queries).


    ❖ The Presentation should be maximum of 20 slides.


    ❖ Participants will be judged on the basis of Presentation, Content, Clarity, Relevance and Preparation.


    ❖ Organizing Committee's decision in any matter will be final and abiding on all.



  • Tech Fun


    A Pick of Pikachu is a technical fun game which is conducted to improve the concentration and focus on game. It is also a type of learning with Some relaxation.


    Rules


    ❖ Two teams can participate from one college.

    ❖ Each team can be comprised of five members.

    ❖ Using mobile phones is prohibited and any malpractice during in it that will be lead your team disqualified.

    ❖ Topic based on programming like C, C++ , Java, Python.

    ❖ Participants maintain discipline inside the college campus.

    ❖ Replacement of any participants of a team is not allowed after registration.

    ❖ Organizing committee's decision in any matter will be final and abiding on all.




Our Vision

Bishop Heber College, A great Institution of higher education set in beautiful surroundings, seeks to function through mutual love and respect and with efficiency and creativity, catering to the educational needs of all, especially the poor, the needy and the under-privileged, inspired by the love of our Lord Jesus Christ.
